name: chartml-monorepo
description: ChartML - A declarative markup language for creating beautiful, interactive data visualizations

scripts.build:packages: cd packages/core && npm run build && cd ../chart-pie && npm run build && cd ../chart-scatter && npm run build && cd ../chart-metric && npm run build && cd ../react && npm run build && cd ../markdown-common && npm run build
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter './packages/*' exec rm -rf dist node_modules && rm -rf docs/node_modules docs/.vitepress/dist docs/.vitepress/cache
